markdownRemark.html: YES! After having my windowing system out of commission for a few weeks, my Debian GNU/kFreeBSD system is again with a functional GUI. I guess the problem wasn't my fault - I did an apt-get update / upgrade, rebooted, and it started up. I did have to undo some of the troubleshooting steps I took, but all in all it was another good learning experience.

frontmatter.title: Debian GNU kFreeBSD Back in Action
